Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs, offering unparalleled value and performance. Given its significance and the benefits it will bring to you, we believe it's worth every penny. Considering its true worth and your anticipated satisfaction, we are offering it to you for $14000. We are confident this price reflects the quality and benefits you will receive, while also providing us with a fair return on our investment. We look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
